system.description:
Prerequisite: Dexterity 13 or higher

You are skilled at hiding and operating from the shadows. You gain the following benefits:

  • You can try to hide even while you are only lightly obscured from the creature you are trying to hide from.

  • Your position isnâ€™t revealed when you miss with a ranged weapon attack against a creature you are hidden from. 

  • You do not have disadvantage from dim light when making Perception checks.
